Identity.History: Indo-European nomads in the Tarim Basin (Xinjiang). Settled in oasis cities like Turfan by 500 BC. Farmed wheat/millet using karez irrigation. Spoke Tocharian languages (centum branch); traded jade/horses on Silk Road. Mummified remains show European features. Adopted Buddhism by 200 AD, blending Hellenistic/Indian art styles.
